entry.title: Colombia Enlists Ripple Labs to Put Land Deeds on Blockchain
entry.summary: Using the Ripple Ledger, Colombian leaders can make real estate transactions more equitable.

entry.title: Magic Eden Rivals Say NFTs on Solana’s Biggest Marketplace Are at Risk
entry.summary: Solana’s top NFT marketplace responds to growing criticism and says it plans to change the way it manages users' assets—but not right away.

entry.title: SEC Charges ‘Fraudsters’ in $300 Million ‘Crypto Pyramid and Ponzi Scheme’
entry.summary: The SEC accused Forsage of raising funds illicitly for over two years.

entry.title: What Bitcoin Miners Are Doing to Survive the Bear Market
entry.summary: The Bitcoin market downturn has halted construction on mining sites and dropped the price of mining equipment—but also created opportunities for a few companies.

entry.title: Self-Professed 'Bitcoin Inventor' Craig Wright Advanced ‘False Evidence’ in Libel Lawsuit: UK Court
entry.summary: Craig Wright was awarded just £1 in the Peter McCormack case after putting forward “deliberately false” evidence, said the UK’s High court.

entry.title: Crypto Firm Chiliz Nabs $100M Stake in FC Barcelona's Digital Studio
entry.summary: Chiliz has acquired nearly a quarter of FC Barcelona's Barça Studios, enabling the club to build better NFT and metaverse projects.

entry.title: UK's New Financial Promotion Guidelines Don't Include Crypto—Yet
entry.summary: Crypto fell outside the UK’s financial regulator's new guidelines targeting high-risk investment products. But that may soon change, said the FCA.

entry.title: Crypto Wallet Maker Ledger Eyes Fresh $100M Raise: Report
entry.summary: Ledger is in talks to raise $100 million. Sources say that business is growing as investors turn to cold storage to safeguard their crypto.

entry.title: Muse to Release Next Album on Polygon-based NFT Platform Serenade
entry.summary: British rock band Muse’s upcoming new album will be released as a limited-edition NFT on the Polygon-powered platform Serenade.

entry.title: What Is Aave? Inside the DeFi Lending Protocol
entry.summary: DeFi protocol Aave is one of the largest lenders of cryptocurrency and its AAVE token has a larger market cap than rivals Maker or Compound. Here's how it works.

entry.title: Tiffany’s Reveals First NFTs—at $51,000 Each
entry.summary: The upcoming sale will feature 250 limited edition NFTs, each priced at 30 ETH.

entry.title: Vitalik: Metaverse ‘Is Going to Happen’ but Meta’s ‘Will Misfire’
entry.summary: The Ethereum creator said corporate attempts at the metaverse will fail because “it’s far too early to know what people actually want.”

entry.title: Aave DAO Approves Creating GHO Stablecoin
entry.summary: The stablecoin will be backed by over-collateralized assets that continue to earn yield.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Wikipedia Accused of Playing Politics, Coinbase-Bored Ape Collab Widely Jeered
entry.summary: Elsewhere, CZ confirmed meeting with Turkey’s finance minister to discuss the blockchain ecosystem and crypto assets.

entry.title: Civic Adds Verification Platform to Battle Bots and Scams
entry.summary: The set of tools is designed to stop bots from taking unfair advantage of NFT drops by limiting the number of wallets an account can use.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum See Continued Growth as Merge Looms
entry.summary: The crypto market held steady this week even after the Fed announced another interest rate hike of 75 basis points.

entry.title: How One DAO Brokered a $14.5 Million Token Deal
entry.summary: Ongoing governance discussion about a fresh token deal between Lido Finance and Dragonfly shows the power of a DAO in real time.

entry.title: ApeCoin DAO to Fund Bored Ape News Site for $150,000
entry.summary: The Bored Ape Gazette will use the funds to create a newsletter, pay freelancers, and revamp its site.

entry.title: Ethereum NFT Sales Hold Steady in July as Trading Volume Sinks Further
entry.summary: Ethereum NFTs are still selling amid the ongoing bear market, albeit at lower prices, while Solana NFT trading has slowed more significantly.

entry.title: Bitcoin Rises 19% in July in Best Trading Month Since Last Year
entry.summary: Ethereum is also soaring—up over 50% in the past 30 days.

entry.title: Pro-Russia Groups Raise $2M in Bitcoin, Ethereum to Fund War: Chainalysis
entry.summary: Ukrainian groups have likewise raised donations in crypto, though at a considerably larger rate.

entry.title: Charles Schwab to Launch Crypto-Themed ETF on New York Stock Exchange
entry.summary: Charles Schwab will launch its first crypto-themed ETF next week, saying it offers the lowest expense ratios in the category.

entry.title: CoinFLEX Announces 'Significant' Layoffs Amid $84M Dispute With 'Bitcoin Jesus'
entry.summary: The company says the move will cut overhead costs by over 50%.

entry.title: Santander to Roll Out Crypto Trading Services in Brazil
entry.summary: Spanish banking giant Santander will reportedly start offering cryptocurrency trading to its clients in Brazil, the firm's CEO said.

entry.title: DeFi Tokens Curve, Lido, ChainLink Jump Double Digits as Crypto Market Rebounds
entry.summary: DeFi tokens like Curve, ChainLink, and Uniswap are among the top gainers as crypto markets reach $1.1 trillion in market capitalization.

entry.title: Fed, FDIC Order Voyager to Stop 'False and Misleading' Insurance Claims
entry.summary: The embattled crypto firm must remove all claims that it and its customers are FDIC insured.

entry.title: City of Miami to Launch 5,000 Ethereum NFTs with TIME, Mastercard, Salesforce
entry.summary: Miami Mayor Francis Suarez's love of Web3 isn't dampened by the crypto winter.

entry.title: Spice DAO to Dissolve After Infamous ‘Dune’ Book Auction
entry.summary: Closing the deal for Alejandro Jodorowsky's storyboards was only the start of the DAO's problems.

entry.title: Axie Infinity CEO Moved $3M in Tokens Before $622M Hack Disclosure: Report
entry.summary: Sky Mavis claimed that founders transferred tokens to allow more “flexibility” in its response to the Ethereum sidechain attack.

entry.title: Ethereum’s Final Testnet Merge Set for Early August
entry.summary: Goerli will be the network’s third and final testnet before the network's transition to proof of stake, which is scheduled for mid-September.

entry.title: Senator Prompts Regulators to 'Do More' to Combat Crypto Scams and Fraud
entry.summary: Senator Sherrod Brown, chair of the banking committee, says crypto investors and consumers need better protections.

entry.title: Bitcoin Bear Market Claims Another Crypto Firm as Zipmex Files for Protection From Bankruptcy
entry.summary: The troubled crypto exchange plans to buy itself time to resolve its liquidity issues.

entry.title: Ethereum Pumps Past $1,700—Is the Merge Surge Back On?
entry.summary: Ethereum’s price is soaring: It’s up 15% in the past 24 hours and 44% in the past month. Here's what's likely driving the action.

entry.title: This MetaMask Ethereum Wallet Update May Help Thwart NFT Scams
entry.summary: Following a rash of social media NFT scams, MetaMask adds an extra step that could help users avoid “wallet drainer” attacks.

entry.title: Step-Counter App Sweatcoin Raises $13M to Fund Leap Into Web3
entry.summary: A new “move-to-earn” project has joined the race, with Sweatcoin pivoting to crypto fueled by a fresh round of funding and a new token.

entry.title: US Stablecoin Bill Pushed to After August Recess
entry.summary: Proposed bipartisan legislation on stablecoins has been delayed until after Congress returns from its August recess, said Rep. Maxine Waters.

entry.title: Over $202M in Short Bitcoin, Ethereum Positions Liquidated Amid Bullish Move
entry.summary: With Bitcoin and Ethereum enjoying hefty gains after the latest rate hike, traders shorting the leading cryptocurrencies were caught out.

entry.title: UK Commission Aims to Clarify Crypto Property Law
entry.summary: The proposals prioritize keeping blockchain technology regulation dynamic, competitive, and flexible.

entry.title: Meta’s Metaverse Division Loses $2.8 Billion in Q2
entry.summary: In the company’s quarterly earnings call, Mark Zuckerberg said the loss-heavy division could eventually be worth trillions.

entry.title: FTC Sues Meta to Stop Facebook Parent From 'Owning the Entire Metaverse'
entry.summary: Meta’s planned acquisition of a VR fitness app maker faces scrutiny as the FTC points to the Facebook parent’s growing metaverse aims.

entry.title: gm: Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon is Finding the 'Soul' in Generative Art NFTs
entry.summary: Art Blocks, the generative NFT series, exploded in popularity and price last fall. Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon (aka "Snowfro") talks to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about why the price surge actually hurt Art Blocks and the problem with NFT speculators, the debate over digital art vs. traditional art and his views on Bored Apes and CryptoPunks, how he got into NFTs after starting a physical tile business with his father, and why he thinks everyone's mortgage will eventually be stored on chain.

entry.title: Matthew Ball on the Role of Crypto and NFTs in the Metaverse
entry.summary: The former Amazon Studios exec and venture capitalist spoke with Decrypt’s Kate Irwin about how crypto fits into the metaverse at an event in Beverly Hills, California.

entry.title: gm: Binance CEO CZ Talks Bailouts, Regulator Demands, and Simulation Theory
entry.summary: In an extensive conversation with Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott, Binance CEO CZ talks global and US regulation, Binance HQ locations, crypto bailouts and how he approaches deals, the sports marketing push by big crypto exchanges and why Binance went slower, and why he believes we live in a simulation.

entry.title: Chelsea Manning Talks Crypto, Privacy, and Security
entry.summary: Chelsea Manning, who gave classified documents regarding the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq to WikiLeaks in 2010, talked to Decrypt's Stacy Elliott about crypto and privacy, decentralization and government, and her work with Nym.

entry.title: Binance CEO CZ on Crypto Bailouts and the Deals He Would Not Do
entry.summary: In an interview for Decrypt's gm podcast, CZ laid out Binance's approach to "bailouts" amid the crypto liquidity crunch, and criticized Alameda's complicated lifeline to Voyager.

entry.title: gm: Senator Cynthia Lummis Is Fighting for Bitcoin
entry.summary: Wyoming Sen. Cynthia Lummis, the "Bitcoin Senator," joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the Lummis-Gillibrand crypto regulation bill, the need for clearer policy on crypto in DC, and converting crypto skeptics—plus her take on the bear market and NFTs. Make sure to subscribe to the podcast.
